title: BUG: It should be base 16, not 8.
comment: There is a critical bug. For HEXADECIMAL, it should be decimalToAnyBase(num, 16).

title: BUG: input >= 4000 not > 4000
comment: Bounds checking in decimalToRoman prevents negative numbers and those greater than 4000, which is excellent. However, the condition should reject the number 4000 as well since it's not representable in the standard Roman numeral system (I to MMMCMXCIX).

title: FIX: Comment should say "input to any base"
comment: Seems to be a copy/paste error. Update it to say "any base" instead of "roman format".

title: FIX: Error message comment not accurate
comment: The error message is not accurate. It ought to indicate that the input needs to be non-negative, as the method permits values that are equal to 0.

title: BUG: input <=0 not <0
comment: Mismatch between function header comment and what the code does. Comment says "must be greater than 0". Fix either the comment or the code.

title: FIX: Add comment at the top of class
comment: Add a comment at the top of the class explaining what the class does.

title: FIX: Missing param Format
comment: Add a comment for the param Format in the function header comment
